titleStmt.title: Bhartṛhari's Dravyasamuddeśa, with the Prakīrṇaprakāśa commentary of Helārāja, working edition

msContents.summary: This is a provisionary critical edition of the text, currently still under active revision, based on thirteen manuscript witnesses and four printed sources.

body.p: jātir vā[om.] dravyaṃ vā padārthāv ity uktamukta | tatra vājapyāyanadarśanenavājapyāyanadarśane vājapyāyaṃ tadarthane jātiṃjāti viśeṣaṇabhūtāṃviśeṣaṇabhūtā padārthaṃpadārthatvena vyavasthāpya vyāḍidarśanenayāḍedarśanena vyāḻidarśanena yāḍidarśanena viśeṣyabhūtaṃviśeṣyarūpaṃ viśeṣyarūpa dravyamdram apiiti pi iti ty api padārthaṃpadārmaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃvyavasthāpayitu yathādarśanaṃtathā darśanaṃ yathāda¦śanaṃ tad evatad eca tad evaṃ deva paryāyāntarairparyāyāṃtaraiparyāyācaryāyāṃtarair uddiśatikaddiśatikaddiśati ||saddiśati [om.] ―

body.p: ihārthakriyāyāṃihārthakriyāṃ dravyam evopayujyataevīyujyata iti tad eva pravartakam arthinām | ataḥataś caataḥ ataś ca tataḥ śabdena tad evocyatetad evovyate | anabhidhīyamānāanadyidhīyamānā anadhidhīyamānā 'nabhivīyamānā tu jātir avacchedikāavacśedikā guḍaśabde[om.]guḍaśabdena guḍaśabder guṃḍaśabder mādhuryādayamādhrarmādaya ivetiraveti dravyavādināṃdravyavādinā darśanamda [om.] | dravyaṃdravya [om.] cava [om.] dvividhaṃdvividha dvivivaṃ [om.] — pāramārthikaṃ[om.] sāṃvyavahārikaṃsāvyavahārikaṃ vahārikaṃ cava | tatrata tu dvitīyaṃdvitīyaṃ dravyaṃ bhedyabhedakaprastāvenabhedyabhedakaprahyāvena bhedyabhedakamahyāvema bhadyabhedakaprastavema bhedyaṃ | bhedakaprastāvena bhedyaṃ bhedakaprastāvena bhedyabhedaprastāvena bhedyabhedakaprastāvema guṇasamuddeśeguṇasamudeśe guṇaśamudeśe vakṣyativakṣyate ‘ ― vastūpalakṣaṇaṃvasttūpalakṣaṇaṃ vasturūpalakṣaṇam yatretyādināyatretyādina || yatretyādina ityādinā | ityādinā | anena ca[om.]va dravyeṇa vyāḍidarśanevyaḍidarśane vyāḻidarśane sarveśabdā dravyābhidhāyinodvavyābhidhāyino dvavyābhidhāyi¦no dravyābhidhāyinoṃ dravyābhidhāyine bhavantibhavati | |
